content: yarn put those 10 stitches back on the left needle and knit the round in the checkboard pattern  knit 24 more rounds in checkerboard pattern for a total of 40 rounds in the checkerboard pattern hand decreases if using short circular needles switch to double pointed needles as needed  decrease round 1 *knit 2 color d knit 2 together color c* around 33 stitches  decrease round 2 *knit 2 color d knit 1 color c* around  decrease round 3 *knit 2 together color c knit 1 color d* around 22 stitches  decrease round 4 *knit 1 color c knit 1 color d* around  decrease round 5 knit 2 together around beginning with color d 11 stitches  decrease round 6 knit even around beginning with color c you are finished with color d  decrease round 7 knit 2 together around in color d and knit color d in the single stitch at the end of the row end color d  using a tapestry needle pull the yarn end through the remaining stitches pull firmly to close draw yarn ends to the inside thumb  using larger size double pointed needles pick up 10 stitches below the scrap yarn and 10 stitches above the scrap yarn you have 20 stitches for the thumb carefully cut away and remove the scrap yarn  using colors a and c and beginning with color a knit around the thumb in the salt and pepper pattern for 15 rounds  thumb decrease round 1 knit 2 together around beginning with color a and alternating colors a and c 10 stitches  thumb decrease round 2 *knit 1 color c knit 1 color a* around cut off color c  thumb decrease round 3 knit 2 together around in color a cut yarn 5 stitches  using a tapestry needle pull the yarn end through the remaining stitches pull firmly to close draw yarn ends to the inside finishing turn mittens inside out and weave in yarn ends under floats of the
